title: A.R.S.E.N.A.L. taste the power
description:
My first torrent ever, it&#039;s a 1998 low-budget game, wich kept me busy for hours.
I still play it every now and then, even if it is nothing compared to the newer games, it is still pretty entertaining.
 
The cool part about this game is that it has a mapgenerator; never play on the same maps. It is easy to learn and can be fun.

 I spend a year getting a working copy like this one, except for me the sound doesnt work (sound isnt all that anyway), so I just watch a bit of tv or listen to music when playing. There seems to be a readme for the audio, (and different files for it) but it is in french.

I am not sharing this cause I think it is awesome, just that it is soooo hard to find. If you like the old, simple games, this one is a musthave. 

About the game, here&#039;s the website http://www.tacticalsoft.com/arsenal1/frame.htm 

**Important** - The mouse ingame is very slow, this can be fixed with adding FASTMOUSE in the shortcut, i.e. .....ARSENAL.EXE FASTMOUSE

PS. The name ingame is not my name, but from the guy who patched it, you can just pick your own name.


Screenshot: http://bayimg.com/dAMkPaABe
